content: *easy afghan is the perfect beginner project yarnspirations * materials bernat® super value solids 7 oz/197 g ombres 5 oz/142 g or 6 oz/170 g *or* bernat® big value solids 6 oz/170 g ombres 4 75 oz/135 g * main color mc **8 balls** 4 75 oz 5 oz or **7 balls** 6 oz or **6 balls** 7 oz * contrast a **2 balls** size 5 mm u s h or 8 crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge english pdf modified march 2 2006 blue afghan to crochet 1 french pdf modified july 19 2007 afghan bleu au crochet 2 spanish pdf modified july 19 2007 cobija tipo afgano azul 3 1 http //www yarnspirations com/assets/files/pattern-files/pdf/bernat_supervalue001_cr_afghan en_us pdf 2 http //www yarnspirations com/assets/files/pattern-files/pdf/bernat_supervalue001_cr_afghan fr_ca pdf 3 http //www yarnspirations com/assets/files/pattern-files/pdf/bernat_supervalue001_cr_afghan es_mx pdf
